If the Country ISO code is specified, then this ISO code will be used to determine the Country Phone Code f or the phone. Pass this ISO code to distinguish between multiple countries sharing the same Country Phone Code. (For example, Country Phone Code '1' is shared by USA, Canada, Dominican Republic, Bermuda, Jamaica and Puerto Rico)</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Country_ISO_Code" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>ISO Code identifying the country where the naming rules for this name are defined. Workday provides the ability for a customer to specify an ISO Code at the country level. Each customer can also define various rules around names, required fields for names, labels for name fields at the Country level. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Country must exist for the value of Country ISO Code.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>No Country with that Country Code Exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Family_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all Job Family data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The ID of the Job Family data (Job_Family_ID).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Effective_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Effective Date of Job Family.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The effective date of the change [date] cannot be earlier than the earliest effective date [early].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying Job Family Name.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Name is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Another Job Family or Job Family Group is already using this name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Summary" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying Job Family Summary.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Inactive" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute indicating if a Job Family/Job Family Group is Inactive or not. Inactive Job Families/Groups will not appear in prompts.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_for_Job_Family_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing the Job Profile reference for a Job Family.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Integration_Field_Override_Data" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Job Classification Group.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Job Classification Group must exist for the given value of Job Classification Group Name.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Job Classification Group does not exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Classification_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Along with Job Classification Group Name (which returns and instance of Job Classification Group), unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Job Classification.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Job Classification must exist for the given values of Job Classification Group Name and Job Classification Name.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Job Classification Name does not exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all Location data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Location Name is required when creating a new Location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Location Name is required when creating a new type="wd:Country_Of_Birth_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Place_Of_Birth" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying Place of Birth.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Date_Of_Birth" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date of Birth.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Gender_Reference" type="wd:Gender_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Disability_Reference" type="wd:Disability_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Uses_Tobacco" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying Tobacco usage.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Country_Of_Birth_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Country of name="Demographic_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element for all Demographic data (e.g. Marital Status, Ethnicity, etc.) associated with a Security Note: This element is secured according to the security policy for the "Military/Citizenship" domain.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Hukou_Subregion_Reference" type="wd:Country_SubregionObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The hukou subregion for the person.
Security Note: This element is secured according to the security policy for the "Military/Citizenship" domain.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Hukou_Locality" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The hukou locality for the person.
Security Note: This element is secured according to the security policy for the "Military/Citizenship" domain.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Hukou_Postal_Code" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The hukou postal code for the person.
Security Note: This element is secured according to the security</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Hukou_Type_Reference" type="wd:Hukou_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The hukou type for the person.
Security Note: This element is secured according to the security policy for the "Military/Citizenship" domain.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Native_Region_Reference" type="wd:Country_RegionObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The native region for the person.
Security Note: This element is secured according to the security policy for the "Military/Citizenship" domain.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Personnel_File_Agency" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Personnel File Agency is used in China to indicate where workers have their personnel file stored.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Military_Service_Data" type="wd:Military_Service_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Employee_Type_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Employee Type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Employee_Type_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute representing Description of an Employee Type.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Employee Type must exist for the given Employee Type exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="External_Contact_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all External Contact name="Contingent_Worker_Contract_Info_GetType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the following Reference element (and other optional attributes) to retrieve an instance of Contingent Worker For "Get" operations, the response element will only include data that is the most effective as of the "As Of Date".</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute name="As_Of_Moment" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Defines the latest moment (e.g. datetime) data was entered into the Workday system. For "Get" operations, the response element will only include data entered into Workday before the "As Of Moment".</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Vendor_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Government_Identifier_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element It must not contain any other character other than digits and hyphen.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Government_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying Government ID.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If the Identifier ID is for a National ID Type, then formatting characters must not be included.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Identifier ID does not match the format required for the National ID Type. type="wd:Government_ID_Type_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element name="Country_Reference" type="wd:Country_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Issued_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the Government ID was issued.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expiration_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the Government ID expires.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Verification_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the Government ID was verified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="License_Identifier_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element for all License Identifier data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="License_Type_Reference" type="wd:License_Type_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="License_Class" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute type="wd:Authority_ReferenceType"/></xsd:choice></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Passport_Identifier_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element for all issued.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expiration_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the Passport ID verified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Organization_Visibility_Reference_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Organization name/description identifying a valid instance of Organization Visibility.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Organization Visibility must exist for the given value of Organization Visibility Name.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Organization Visibility Name does not exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Organization_Subtype_Reference_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Organization given value of Organization Subtype Name.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Organization Subtype Name does not name="Employee_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Employee.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="System_User_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The data necessary to create or update a user's account in the Workday system.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that the user name provided is not already in use by another system user.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>User Name already taken, please choose another one.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that a password is provided (or will be generated) for a new Workday account.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Password is required when creating a new Workday Account.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that an email address is available if the random password option is specified.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Unable to Generate Random Password due to missing email address for notification.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that the code provided matches one of the locale codes in the Workday system.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Invalid Locale Code.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Exempt cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Enabled cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be less than 0 or greater than the tenant Maximum Grace Period Login Count: [max count]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="User_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user name the new user will use to sign on to Workday.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The entered User Name is longer than the current tenant maximum. The tenant max is set to [max].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Session_Timeout_Minutes"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The number of minutes the user may be idle before the system requires them to re-enter their user name and password.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that the timeout setting is between 5 and 720 minutes.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Session Timeout Minutes must be greater than 5 and less than or equal to [max]. The default value is [default].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Session Timeout Minutes must be greater than 5 and less than or equal to [max]. The default value is [default].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="3"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Account_Disabled" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user is prevented from signing on to the system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Account_Expiration_Date" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be prevented from signing on to the system after this date (Pacific Time).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Account_Locked" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user is prevented from signing on to the system until their account is unlocked.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Required_New_Password_At_Next_Login" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be required to change their password upon initial sign on.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Show_User_Name_in_Browser_Window" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The web browser title will include the user name in parenthesis.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Display_XML_Icon_on_Reports" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be presented with an icon to view reports as an RSS feed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Enable_Workbox" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will have the Workbox tab available in the right-side slide-out.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Locale_Reference" type="wd:LocaleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The local defines the user's language and country which will affect their experience in the Workday system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="User_Language_Reference" type="wd:User_LanguageObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If set, specifies language for user. If not set, language specification taken from Locale_Reference parameter.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference" type="wd:Unique_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If set, specifies the initial search category displayed to the user.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference" type="wd:Integration_System__Audited_ObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be authenticated via an external system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Allow_Mixed-Language_Transactions" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user is allowed to view mixed language transactions.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Notification_Sub_Type_Configurations" type="wd:Notification_Sub_Category_Configurations_for_UsersType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Notification Type Configurations for a particular user</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:choice><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Password" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The initial password the user will sign on with.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that the password conforms to the configured password rules.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The password does not meet password requirements.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Generate_Random_Password" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The system should generate a random password for the user.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exempt_from_Delegated_Authentication" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True when the user is exempt from Delegated Authentication, False otherwise. Set this element to true if you want the user to be exempt from delegated authentication.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Passcode_Exempt" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True when the user is exempt from One-Time Passcode Authentication, False otherwise. Set this element to true if you want the user to be exempt from one-time passcode authentication.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Passcode_Grace_Period_Enabled" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True when the user's One-Time Passcode grace period is enabled, False otherwise. Set this element to false if you want the user's one-time passcode grace period to be disabled.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Passcode_Grace_Period_Login_Remaining_Count"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The remaining number of times the user can login without providing a one-time passcode. This cannot be higher than the configured tenant maximum grace period login count.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="12"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OpenID_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is used for OpenID based authentication and contains the email address associated with the OpenID account. This value needs to be provided to enable OpenID authentication for this user.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OpenID_Internal_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is used for OpenID based authentication and contains the OpenID GUID. It will be unpopulated until the user completes an initial successful OpenID authentication attempt.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OpenID_Connect_Internal_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is used for OpenID Connect based authentication and contains the OpenID Connect subject. It will be unpopulated until the user completes an initial successful OpenID Connect authentication attempt.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Emergency_Contact_Data_WWSType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all Emergency Contact data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Emergency Contact Data: ID subelements of Integration ID Data cannot reference multiple Emergency Contacts.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Emergency Contact Data: ID subelements of Integration ID Data reference multiple Emergency Contacts.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Integration_ID_Data" type="wd:External_Integration_ID_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Language_Reference" type="wd:Language_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Emergency_Contact_Priority_Reference" type="wd:Emergency_Contact_Priority_ReferenceType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Dependent_Data_WWSType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all Dependent data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Dependent Data: Type.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Phone Device Type must exist for the given value of Phone Device Type exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Marital_Status_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Marital Status.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Marital Status must exist for the given value of Marital Status Description in a specific Location Context. The location context is derived from the person's location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Marital Status Description does not exist for the location context for the person's location. Additionally, it must not be Inactive.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Marital_Status_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Marital Status.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Ethnicity_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Ethnicity. For certain tenants, especially US Public Sector Higher Education, Ethnicity may be a non-singluar relationship (as of V13).</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Ethnicity must exist for the given value of Ethnicity Name and Location Context. The Location Context is derived from the person's location country.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Ethnicity Name does not exist in the Location Context of the person. Additionally, it must not be Inactive. The Location Context is derived from the location's country.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Ethnicity_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Along with Organization (defines Regulatory Region), unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Region</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Citizenship_Status_Description" minOccurs="0" name="Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying Event Description.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element Moment!</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Updated Through must be less than or equal to Current Moment!</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Effective From must be less than or equal to Effective Through!</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Effective From must be less than or equal to Effective Through!</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If one of Effective From or Effective Through contains a value, both are Required!</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>If one of Effective From or Effective Through contains a value, both are Required!</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If one of Updated From or Updated Through contains a value, both are Required!</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>If one of Updated From or Updated Through contains a value, both are Required!</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Updated From must be less than or equal to Updated Through!</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Updated From must be less than or equal to Updated Through!</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Updated_From" system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Updated_Through" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Defines the latest choose another one.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Either Password parameter or Generate_Random_Password parameter must be set to false.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Either Password parameter or Generate_Random_Password parameter must be set to false.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If Generate_Random_Password parameter is set to true, Require_New_Password_at_Next_Login parameter must also be set to true.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>If Generate_Random_Password parameter is set to true, Require_New_Password_at_Next_Login parameter must also be set to true.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="User_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying User Name.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>User Name Parameter must not contain any semicolons or colons</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>User Name Parameter must not contain any semicolons or colons</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The entered User Name is longer than the current tenant maximum. The tenant max is set to [max].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Password" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying Password.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Password must meet password requirements.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The password does not meet password requirements.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Generate_Random_Password" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If True, generates a random password for the specified Workday Account and emails the new password to the email address associated with that account. If False, a new password can be provided in a different field, or if that is not provided, the associated Workday Account's password is unchanged.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If Generate_Random_Password is true, the user must have an email address on file, the tenant must be set up to send security emails, and the user cannot use delegated authentication.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>If Generate_Random_Password is true, the user must have an email address on file, the tenant must be set up to send security emails, and the user cannot use delegated authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Require_New_Password_at_Next_Sign_In" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether user will need to enter a new password upon next sign-in to the Workday system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="One-Time_Passcode_Exempt" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True when the user is exempt from One-Time Passcode Authentication, False otherwise. Set this element to true if you want the user to be exempt from one-time passcode authentication.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One-Time Passcode Exempt cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Exempt cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Enabled" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True when the user's One-Time Passcode grace period is enabled, False otherwise. Set this element to false if you want the user's one-time passcode grace period to be disabled.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Enabled cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Enabled cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Login_Remaining_Count"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The remaining number of times the user can login without providing a one-time passcode. This cannot be higher than the configured tenant maximum grace period login count.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be less than 0 or greater than the tenant Maximum Grace Period Login Count</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be less than 0 or greater than the tenant Maximum Grace Period Login Count: [max count]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="12"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Account_Disabled" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether Workday Account is disabled.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Account_Expiration_Date" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be prevented from signing on to the system after this date (Pacific Time).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OpenID_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is used for OpenID based authentication and contains the email address associated with the OpenID account. This value needs to be provided to enable OpenID authentication for this user.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OpenID_Internal_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is used for OpenID based authentication and contains the OpenID GUID. It will be unpopulated until the user completes an initial successful OpenID authentication attempt.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OpenID_Connect_Internal_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is used for OpenID Connect based authentication and contains the OpenID Connect subject. It will be unpopulated until the user completes an initial successful OpenID Connect authentication attempt.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference" type="wd:Integration_System__Audited_ObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be authenticated via an external system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Session_Timeout_Minutes"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The number of minutes the user may be idle before the system requires them to re-enter their user name and password.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Session Timeout Minutes must be greater than 5 and less than or equal to [max]. The default value is [default].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="3"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Show_User_Name_in_Browser_Window" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The web browser title will include the user name in parenthesis.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Display_XML_Icon_on_Reports" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will be presented with an icon to view reports as an RSS feed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Enable_Workbox" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user will have the Workbox tab available in the right-side slide-out.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Locale_Reference" type="wd:LocaleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The local defines the user's language and country which will affect their experience in the Workday system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="User_Language_Reference" type="wd:User_LanguageObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If set, specifies language for user. If not set, language specification taken from Locale_Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference" type="wd:Unique_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If set, specifies the initial search category displayed to the user.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Allow_Mixed-Language_Transactions" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The user is allowed to view mixed language transactions.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Notification_Sub_Type_Configurations" type="wd:Notification_Sub_Category_Configurations_for_UsersType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exempt_from_Delegated_Authentication" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True when the user is exempt from Delegated Authentication, False otherwise. Set this element to true if you want the user to be exempt from delegated authentication.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Workday_Account_for_Worker_UpdateType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the following elements to update an existing Workday Account into the Workday system.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Workday Account must exist for the given Worker Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>No Workday Account found for referenced Worker.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Worker Reference or Non Worker Reference must be omitted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Worker Reference or Non Worker Reference must be omitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Worker_Reference" type="wd:Worker_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Non_Worker_Reference" type="wd:RoleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to the person (non employee or contingent worker) for whom you are updating the account</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data" type="wd:Workday_Account_for_Worker_DataType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Company_Insider_Type_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Company Insider Type.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A valid instance of Company Insider Type must exist for the given value of Company Insider Type Name.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Company Insider Type does not exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Company_Insider_Type_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Company Insider Type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Workday_Account_for_Worker_AddType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the following data element to add a new User Account into the Workday system.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Either Password or Generate_Random_Password must have a value when creating a new Workday Account</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Either Password or Generate_Random_Password must have a value when creating a new Workday Account</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Workday Account cannot already exist for the referenced Worker.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>A Workday Account already exists for referenced Worker.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Worker Reference or Non Worker Reference must be omitted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Worker Reference or Non Worker Reference must be omitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Worker_Reference" type="wd:Worker_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Non_Worker_Reference" type="wd:RoleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to the person (non employee or contingent worker) for whom you are updating the account</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data" type="wd:Workday_Account_for_Worker_DataType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Company_Insider_Type_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all company insider type data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Insider_Type_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Company Insider Type ID. This is the unique identifier for a company insider type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Insider_Type_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Company Insider Type Name.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Company Insider Type Name is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Company Insider Type Name has already been used.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Insider_Type_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Company Insider Type description.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Inactive" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean that indicates if a Company Insider Type is inactive.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Country_Region_ReferenceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Country Region. Note that this is a multipart key of Region name and Country code.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Country Region specified in the Reference does not exist.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Country Region Reference does not exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Country_Reference" type="wd:Country_ReferenceType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Country_Region_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A name uniquely identifying a Country Region (a geographic or governmental subdivision).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_iDataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all Location data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Location Name is required when creating a new Location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Location Name is required when creating a new Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Time Profile Reference is required when creating a new Location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Time Profile Reference is required when creating a new Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Usage Type is Invalid for this Contactable.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Usage Type is Invalid for this Contactable.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validates that the code provided matches one of the locale codes in the Workday system.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Invalid Locale Code.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>You must choose a Workday-supported User Language that has been enabled in this tenant.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>You must choose a Workday-supported User Language that has been enabled in this tenant.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Locations must be uniquely assigned to a location hierarchy. A location can be assigned to one or more location hierarchy organizations, but can only be assigned to one organization in a hierarchy.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Locations must be uniquely assigned to a location hierarchy. A location can be assigned to one or more location hierarchy organizations, but can only be assigned to one organization in a hierarchy.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Work Space Location cannot be a Business Site at the same time.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>A Work Space Location cannot be a Business Site at the same time.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Business Site cannot be a subordinate of a Work Space.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>A Business Site cannot be a subordinate of a Work Space.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Work Space Locations must be a subordinate of Work Space or Business site, it cannot be a top-level Location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Work Space Locations must be a subordinate of Work Space or Business site, it cannot be a top-level Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Another location already exists with the same latitude, longitude, and altitude.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Another location already exists with the same latitude, longitude, and altitude.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Worksite ID Code must be unique within a US State. Please change the Worksite ID Code.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Worksite ID Code must be unique within a US State. Please change the Worksite ID Code.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Worksite ID Code and Trade Name are valid only for Locations based in US.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Worksite ID Code and Trade Name are valid only for Locations based in US.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Address is required for a location used as a business site without address defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Address is required for a location used as a business site without address defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>This location cannot be inactivated as it is the primary location on at least 1 active supervisory organization.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>This location cannot be inactivated as it is the primary location on at least 1 active supervisory organization.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>An Instructional Site Location cannot be a Campus at the same time.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>An Instructional Site Location cannot be a Campus at the same time.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Owning organization is required for an instructional location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Owning organization is required for an instructional location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Address is required for a Par Location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Address is required for a Par Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A selected Location Attribute is marked as inactive.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>A selected Location Attribute is marked as inactive.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Location Usages of the Location Attributes must match the usages on the Location.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Location Usages of the Location Attributes must match the usages on the Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Effective Date cannot be specified when creating a new location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't select both Business Site and Job Posting in the Location Usage field. Remove 1 of them.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Address is required for a Job Posting Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Location_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The unique location ID. The organization, position and hire tabs will reference location ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Effective_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Specifies the Effective Date for updates to these fields only: Location Name, Inactive, and Location Hierarchy Reference. Blank means these field values will be effective as of the beginning of time. Must be blank for new locations.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Location_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Location_Usage_Reference" type="wd:Location_UsageObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the usage of the Location. (e.g. Business Site, Work Space, etc.)</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Business Asset is currently in use and cannot be unchecked at this time.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Business Site is currently in use in [usage_count] places and cannot be unchecked unless all usages are removed. Places to check where it may be in use include: current and historical assignment to an active position, primary location on a supervisory organization, hiring restriction, bank routing rule, employee contract, payroll usage including result lines, custom report filter, or a condition rule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Work Space is currently in use and cannot be unchecked at this time. Places to check where it may be in use include: assignment to an active position, primary location on a supervisory organization, hiring restriction, custom report filter, or a condition rule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Location that has a Work Space Location as subordinate must be a Business Site or a Work Space Location.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Work Space Location cannot have a Business Site Location as Subordinate.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Inventory is currently in use and cannot be unchecked at this time.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't remove Job Posting as the Location Usage because it's being used [count] times as the Default Job Posting Location in other Business Site type locations.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payroll Tax location usage may not be removed as payroll tax mappings exist.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Type_Reference" type="wd:Location_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The location type associated with the location that ties to the usage that has been setup. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Attribute_Reference" type="wd:Location_AttributeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Location Attributes associated with this Location. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Superior_Location_Reference" type="wd:LocationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Superior Location Reference. Reference to another Location that is Superior. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Assigning this superior location would create a circular reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Both Editing Location and Its superior cannot be Inventory Sites</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't assign a superior location that will result in 2 inventory sites in the same location chain.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Unable to assign this superior location because the editing location is an Inventory Site and the superior location is or contain Inventory Site within the location chain hierarchy.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Unable to assign the superior location because the editing location has Inventory Transaction and its Inventory Site is different than the Inventory Site of the Superior Location</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Unable to remove the Superior Location because the editing location contain Inventory Transaction</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Inactive" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute indicates if the Location is inactive.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Unable to inactivate location when Tax Location Mapping Exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Latitude"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Latitude for a Coordinate. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="8"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Longitude"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Longitude for a Coordinate. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="9"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Altitude"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Altitude for a Coordinate. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="10"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Time_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Time_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The time profile associated with the location. This ties to the time profile description that has been set up. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Locale_Reference" type="wd:LocaleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Locale used by the Location. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Display_Language_Reference" type="wd:User_LanguageObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Default Display Language for the Location. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Time_Zone_Reference" type="wd:Time_ZoneObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Time Zone of the Location. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Default_Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Default Currency for the Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="External_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>An alternate name for the primary location when the job details display on the Recruiting External Career Sites.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Default_Job_Posting_Location_Reference" type="wd:LocationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Define the location that's used when posting jobs for this business site location. This can be overridden by entering a different Job Posting Location Override on the Job Requisition.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot specify a location as a Default Job Posting Location for itself.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Locations used as a Default Job Posting Location must have a Location Usage of Job Posting or Business Site.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Trade_Name"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The division or subsidiary name of the establishment. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:maxLength value="35"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Worksite_ID_Code"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique alpha/numeric identifier that identifies the business at this physical location. If left blank, existing values will be removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:maxLength value="21"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Instructional_Site_Data" type="wd:Location_Instructional_Site_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Contact_Data" type="wd:Contact_Information_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Integration_ID_Data" type="wd:External_Integration_ID_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Hierarchy_Reference" type="wd:Location_HierarchyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a Location Hierarchy the includes this Location. name="Include_Subordinate_Organizations" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>When this boolean value is set to true, indicates to include all subordinate organizations to the maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Plan_Reference" type="wd:Benefit_PlanObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The unique identifier to a benefits plan, along with a string describing the benefits plan. Identifies the benefit plan or plans that can be used for Benefit Enrollment and Benefit Eligibility. Enrollment is checked when the benefit plan year falls within the effective date. Otherwise, if the benefit plan year falls outside of the effective data, then eligibility is checked.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Field_And_Parameter_Criteria_Data" type="wd:Field_And_Parameter_Criteria_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="National_ID_Criteria_Data" type="wd:Worker_by_National_ID_Request_CriteriaType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exclude_Inactive_Workers" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Excludes from the response terminated employees or contingent workers whose contracts have ended. The ID consists of a type attribute, which should be set to "Employee_ID" or "Contingent_Worker_ID", and a value attribute, such as "04345".</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Employee_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Skip_Non_Existing_Instances" type="xsd:boolean"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Business_Sub_Process_ParametersType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Container for the processing options for sub-business processes within a business process. If no options are submitted (or the options are submitted as 'false') then the sub-business process is simply initiated as if it where submitted on-line with approvals, reviews, notifications and to-do's in place. If the Initiator is an Integration System User, any validations you configured on the Initiation step are ignored.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:choice><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Auto_Complete" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Skip" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically skipped (if it is defined as "skippable" within the business process definition).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Business_Process_Comment_Data" type="wd:Business_Process_Comment_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Business_Process_Attachment_Data" type="wd:Business_Process_Attachment_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Use the response group to limit the response to the data you are interested in. Data, and Role Data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates minOccurs="0" name="Include_Compensation" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Compensation Data element is included in the Required</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ID_Type_Reference" type="wd:Passport_ID_Type__All_ObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Passport Identifier Type.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Passport ID Type required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[pit] does not match the specified country, [country]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Country_Reference" type="wd:CountryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Country issuing the passport identifier.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Country is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Issued_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the passport identifier was issued.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an Issue date that is on or before the expiration date: [exp date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expiration_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Expiration date of the passport identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Verification_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Veritification date of the passport identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Verified_By_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Worker who verified the ID</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a different worker in the Verified By field. The worker you entered was terminated before the Verification Date: [date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="License_ID_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper for License Identifier Data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>In order to specify an issuing body for the license, only one of Country Reference, Country Region Reference, or Authority Reference is allowed.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one of Country Reference, Country Region Reference, or Authority Reference is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>License Identifier.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Identifier ID is Required</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ID_Type_Reference" type="wd:License_ID_Type__All_ObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>License Identifier Type.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>License ID Type required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Country_Reference" type="wd:CountryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Country issuing the license identifier. No more than one of of Country Reference, Country Region Reference, or Authority Reference can be specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Country_Region_Reference" type="wd:Country_RegionObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Country Region issuing the license identifier. No more than one of of Country Reference, Country Region Reference, or Authority Reference can be specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Country_Region_Descriptor" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Country Region issuing the license identifier. No more than one of of Country Reference, Country Region Reference, or Authority Reference can be specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Authority_Reference" type="wd:AuthorityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Authority issuing the license identifier. No more than one of of Country Reference, Country Region Reference, or Authority Reference can be specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="License_Class" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>License Class</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Issued_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the license identifier was issued.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an Issue date that is on or before the expiration date: [exp date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expiration_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Expiration date of the license identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Verification_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Verification date of the license identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Verified_By_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Worker who verified the ID</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a different worker in the Verified By field. The worker you entered was terminated before the Verification Date: [date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Custom_ID_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper for Custom Identifier Data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Custom Identifier.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Identifier ID required. Custom ID Type specified does not have a sequence generator.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ID_Type_Reference" type="wd:Custom_ID_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Custom identifier Type.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Custom ID Type is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Issued_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the custom identifier was issued.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an Issue date that is on or before the expiration date: [exp date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expiration_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Expiration date of the custom identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Organization_ID_Reference" type="wd:OrganizationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Organization issuing the custom Identifier.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Organization_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Custom_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Description of the custom identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="AccomplishmentType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Accomplishment data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>That Skill is already in use by another person. Select another one or leave it blank.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Accomplishment_Reference" type="wd:AccomplishmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference ID for the Accomplishment Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Accomplishment_Data" type="wd:Accomplishment_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Accomplishment the Job History profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_History_Data" type="wd:Job_History_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Job History Data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Certification_AchievementType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for type="wd:Certification_SkillObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reference to the certification profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="TrainingType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Training
