type="wd:Training_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Training information.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="AwardType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Award information.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>That Award is already in use by a different person. Use a different one or leave the field blank.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Reference" type="wd:AwardObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Award Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Award_Data" type="wd:Award_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Award information.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Professional_Affiliation_SkillType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Organization Professional Affiliation information.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Organization_Membership_Reference" type="wd:Professional_Affiliation_SkillObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the membership profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Organization_Membership_Data" type="wd:Professional_Affiliation_Organization_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Organization Professional Affiliation information.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Accomplishment_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Accomplishment data.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for an accomplishment for a particular worker.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>There is an in progress event for this worker for the accomplishment: [accomplishment]. Only one in progress event is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Accomplishment_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Accomplishment ID. If no value is provided, a new accomplishment will be created. If a value is passed in an a corresponding accomplishment is not found, a new accomplishment will be created with the provided id.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Remove_Accomplishment" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Used for inbound operations to indicate that the accomplishment should be removed for the person. Will always return false for outbound operations.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accomplishment Removed is true without an Accomplishment or valid Accomplishment ID. An Accomplishment or valid Accomplishment ID must be specified in order to remove the Accomplishment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Accomplishment" type="wd:RichText"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Details about the accomplishment. Required unless the accomplishment is being removed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accomplishment Description must be specified unless the accomplishment is being removed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Start date of the accomplishment. Required unless the accomplishment is being removed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Start Date must be specified unless the accomplishment is being removed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Completion date of the accomplishment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Position_Reference" type="wd:Position_ElementObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference ID of the position when the accomplishment was achieved.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Position is not valid for this Worker as of the effective date. Worker: [worker] Position: [position] Date: [date]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Position submitted is not filled as of the effective date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_History_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the job history information.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for a job history for a particular worker.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>There is an in progress event for this worker for the Job History: [job]. Only one in progress event is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Either the Company or a Job History Company Reference must be specified, unless the Job History is being removed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Either a Company name or Job History Company reference must be specified, but not both.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Job_History_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>External Employment ID. If no value is provided, a new external employment will be created. If a value is passed in an a corresponding external employment is not found, a new external employment will be created with the provided id.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Remove_Job_History" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Used for inbound operations to indicate that the Job History should be removed for the person. Will always return false for outbound operations.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove Job History is true without a Job History or valid External Employment ID. A Job History or valid External Employment ID must be specified in order to remove the Job History.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Title" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Business Title for the job. Required unless the Job History is being removed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Job Title must be specified unless the Job History is being removed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Company" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the company. Either this field or Job History Company Reference is required unless the Job History is being removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Job_History_Company_Reference" type="wd:Job_History_CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to an existing Job History Company. Either this field or Company is required unless the Job History is being removed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The start date of employment. Required unless the Job History is being removed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Start Date must be specified unless the Job History is being removed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The end date of employment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Responsibilities_and_Achievements" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Description of responsibilities and achievements during the tenure of the job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Location" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The location of the job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Reference" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>References from colleagues, subordinates,managers, associates during the job tenure.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Contact" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contact information for the job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Competency_Achievement_Data__v10_Type"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Competency Data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Competency_Level_Behavior_Reference" type="wd:Unique_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Statement about the Competency.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Competency_Level_Behavior_Descriptor" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Statement about the Competency.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Assessment_Comment" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Comments about the competency assessment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Assessed_On" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the competency assessment was carried out.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Assessed_By_Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Worker carrying out the competency assessment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Assessed_By_Worker_Descriptor" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Worker carrying out the competency assessment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Competency_Reference" type="wd:CompetencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference for the Competency.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Competency_Descriptor" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference for the Competency.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Certification_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Certification information.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>As of v13, certification name and issuer are no longer required. You may submit a certification reference or a name and issuer.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>You must either submit a Certification Reference or a Certification Name and Issuer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for a certification for a particular worker.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>There is an in progress event for this worker for the certification: [cert]. Only one in progress event is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Exam Date must be less than or equal to Issued Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Exam Date must be less than or equal to Issued Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Expiration Date may not be prior to Issued Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Expiration Date may not be prior to Issued Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Issued Date must be less than or equal to today's date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Issued Date must be less than or equal to today's date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Exam Date must be less than Expiration Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Exam Date must be less than Expiration Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You must first select Enable Specialties for Certifications on the Maintain Skills and Experience Setup task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Checks that there are either no duplicates, or the only duplicate returned is this instance (an edit is happening)</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>This certification is already in use.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Certification_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Certification ID. If no value is provided, a new certification will be created. If a value is passed in and a corresponding certification is not found, a new certification will be created with the provided id.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Remove_Certification" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Used for inbound operations to indicate that the certification should be removed for the person. Will always return false for outbound operations.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove Certification is true without a Certification Skill or valid Certification ID. A Certification or valid Certification ID must be specified in order to remove the Certification.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Certification_Reference" type="wd:CertificationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Certification Reference, i.e. from the list of pre-defined certifications.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Country_Reference" type="wd:CountryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The country in which the certification is used.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Certification_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the Certification.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Issuer" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The authority issuing the certification.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Certification_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Certification Number for the Certification.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Issued_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the certification was issued.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expiration_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date of expiration of the certification.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Examination_Score" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The person's score on the certification examination.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Examination_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the certification examination was taken.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Specialty_Achievement_Data" type="wd:Specialty_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This data contains information about any specialties and subspecialties associated with the certification achievement.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Worker_Document_Data" type="wd:Certification_Attachment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Worker Document Data is only used for worker certifications. Do not use this for applicants.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Training_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Training information.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for a training for a particular worker.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>There is an in progress event for this worker for the training: [training]. Only one in progress event is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Training Type is required and must have a value.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Training_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Training ID. If no value is provided, a new training will be created. If a value is passed in and a corresponding training is not found, a new training will be created with the provided id.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Remove_Training" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Used for inbound operations to indicate that the training should be removed for the person. Will always return false for outbound operations.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove Training is true without an Training or valid Training ID. type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payroll_File_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The external payroll file number for the position.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Status_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all Status data for a Worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Active" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the Worker is Active.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Active_Status_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The most recent date the employee's status was changed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Hire_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The most recent hire date for the employee or contract start date for the contingent worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Original_Hire_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Earliest Hire Date for the Worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Hire_Reason_Reference" type="wd:General_Event_SubcategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reason for Hire from the most recent Hire event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="End_Employment_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Employment End Date for the Worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Continuous_Service_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Continuous Service Date for the Worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Day_of_Work" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>First Day of Work only applies to the Payroll web service.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expected_Retirement_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Expected retirement date for the worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Retirement_Eligibility_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Retirement Eligibility Date for the Worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Retired" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the Worker is currently retired.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Retirement_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Most recent Retirement Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Seniority_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Seniority date for the worker. Defaults to hire date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Severance_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Severance date for the worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Benefits_Service_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Benefits Service Date for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Service_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Company Service Date for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Time_Off_Service_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Time Off Service Date for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Vesting_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Vesting Date for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Date_Entered_Workforce" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the employee first entered the workforce (for any employer).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Days_Unemployed"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Number of days the worker was unemployed between the time they first entered the workforce and the date they were hired by the current employer.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="12"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Months_Continuous_Prior_Employment"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Number of months that the employee worked continuously prior to being hired by the current employer.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="14"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Terminated" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the Worker is currently Terminated.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Termination_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Most recent Termination Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Pay_Through_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The payroll pay through date from the worker's most recent termination.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Termination_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Termination_SubcategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The primary reason for the worker's most recent termination.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Termination_Category_Reference" type="wd:Event_Classification_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to primary termination reason category.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Termination_Involuntary" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the termination was involuntary.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Termination_Reasons_Data" type="wd:Secondary_Termination_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Secondary Termination Reasons Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Local_Termination_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Local_Termination_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The local reason for the worker's most recent termination.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Not_Eligible_for_Hire" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This boolean specifies a Worker's overall hire eligibility, which is computed using a formula:
eligible = (recent termination event reviewer says eligible AND recent exit interviewer says eligible AND recent pre-hire manager hasn't said anything) OR (whatever recent pre-hire manager says)
In English: - If the hire eligibility has not been explicitly reviewed by a pre-hire manager after the most recent termination, a pre-hire is eligible if both the termination event reviewer and exit interviewer agree that they are eligible. - Otherwise, always return the eligibility status that was explicitly reviewed by the pre-hire manager.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Regrettable_Termination" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the termination was regrettable.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Not_Eligible_for_Rehire" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying if the worker was specified as not eligible for rehire on his or her recent termination.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Termination_Last_Day_of_Work" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Last day worked for the worker's termination event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Resignation_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the employee submitted their resignation.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Date_for_Which_Paid" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The last date for which the Canadian worker is paid as specified on the most recent termination transaction for the worker. This field is specific to Canadian employment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Expected_Date_of_Return" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Canadian worker is expected to return as specified on the most recent termination transaction for the worker. This field is specific to Canadian employment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Not_Returning" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Returns "Yes" if the Canadian worker is not expected to return as specified on the most recent termination transaction. This field is specific to Canadian employment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Return_Unknown" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Returns "Yes" if it is unknown if the Canadian worker is expected to return as specified on the most recent termination transaction. This field is specific to Canadian employment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Probation_Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Primary Position Probation Start Date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Probation_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Primary Position Probation End Date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Status_Data" type="wd:Leave_Status_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containg all Leave Status data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Requests_Corrected_Data" type="wd:Leave_Requests_Corrected_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing leave requests that have been corrected.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Tenure_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the worker received tenure.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Rehire" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Returns "Yes" if the worker is a rehire based on the most recent hire event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Leave_Status_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containg all Leave Status data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Request_Event_Reference" type="wd:Leave_Request_EventObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Worker Leave Event</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Request_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The description of Leave Request Event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Return_Event_Reference" type="wd:Unique_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The leave request return event. Contains information to the reference of leave return only when the leave has been returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="On_Leave" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the Worker is On Leave (as of As Of Date).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Current leave event Start Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Estimated_Leave_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Current leave event Estimated End Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Leave_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Most recent leave event Actual End Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Day_Of_Work" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>First Day of Work.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Last_Day_of_Work" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Last day of work for the worker's leave event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Leave_of_Absence_Type_Reference" type="wd:Leave_of_Absence_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The type of leave.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Benefits_Effect" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the leave event has a Benefits Effect.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payroll_Effect" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the leave event has a Payroll Effect.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Paid_Time_Off_Accrual_Effect" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the leave event has a Absence Accrual Effect.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Continuous_Service_Accrual_Effect" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the leave event has a Continuous Service Accrual Effect.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Stock_Vesting_Effect" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the leave event has a Stock Vesting Effect.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Type_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Leave_Type_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Leave Type Reason</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Leave_Request_Additional_Fields" type="wd:Leave_Request_Additional_FieldsType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element to capture all the leave request additional fields</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Transaction_Log_EntryType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element name="Transaction_Log_Data" type="wd:Transaction_Log_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Transaction_Log_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing the data of the transaction log entry.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Description of the Transaction Log</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Effective_Moment" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date attribute identifying the effective moment of the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Entry_Moment" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date attribute identifying the entry moment of the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Type_Reference" type="wd:Transaction_Log_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>References to the transaction log types of the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Target_Reference" type="wd:Event_TargetObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>References to the transaction targets of the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Is_Rescind_Or_Rescinded" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction log is either an event that has been rescinded or is a rescind event that rescinds another event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Is_Correction_Or_Corrected" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction log is either an event that has been corrected or is a correction event that corrects another event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Employer_Contribution_Percentage_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This section holds the employer contribution if the plan includes employer contributions and the contributions are stated in percentages.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Election_Percentage"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The employer's contribution.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="5"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Transaction_Type_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing Transaction Types.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Type_Reference" type="wd:Transaction_Log_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If specified, this search criterium will return those Transaction Log Entries with Transaction Types that match the search criterium.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Event_Target_Transaction_Log_Entry_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all transaction log entries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Entry" type="wd:Transaction_Log_EntryType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Create_Workday_Account_Sub_Business_ProcessType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper to hold the Complete is True.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Business_Sub_Process_Parameters" type="wd:Business_Sub_Process_ParametersType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for web services sub business process parameters.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Create_Workday_Account_Data" type="wd:System_User_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for workday account data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Health_Care_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the health care data for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Health_Care_Period_Data" type="wd:Worker_Health_Care_Period_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the health care period data for an employee based on the benefit plan year.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Health_Care_Period_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the health care period data for an employee based on the benefit plan year.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Enrollment_Period_Data" type="wd:Enrollment_Period_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the benefit plan year information.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Health_Care_Coverage_Data" type="wd:Worker_Health_Care_Coverage_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the health care coverage information (elections) for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Health_Care_Coverage_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the health care coverage information (elections) for an employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Health_Care_Coverage_Target_Reference" type="wd:Health_Care_Coverage_TargetObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to the level of coverage elected.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Original_Coverage_Begin_Date_for_Coverage_Target" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The first date that coverage began for this type of coverage level.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Provider_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Provider ID of the Primary Care Physician for the employee.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Election_Data" type="wd:Worker_Benefit_Election_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The election information for the coverage.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Dependent_Coverage_Data" type="wd:Dependent_Coverage_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the dependents covered for the election.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Benefit_Election_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The election information for the coverage.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Coverage_Begin_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that the coverage began for the coverage level, dependents, and beneficiaries (if applicable).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Coverage_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that coverage ended for this election.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Election_Coverage_Begin_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that coverage began for this election.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Original_Coverage_Begin_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The first date that coverage began for this election. This is used to track when an employee first elected a coverage.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Original_Coverage_Begin_Date_for_Benefit_Coverage_Type" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The first date that coverage began for this type of coverage.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deduction_Begin_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that the deduction began for this plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deduction_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that the deduction ended for plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Election_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The status of the coverage: Current, Prior, or Future</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Enrollment_Signature_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates the date on file for the enrollment on file for the enrollment signature.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Plan_Summary_Data" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Original_Plan_Enrollment_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>First time an individual enrolled in the plan of this benefit election, ignoring type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>First time an individual enrolled in any plan associated with this provider for this election, ignoring gaps in coverage.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Is_Corrected_or_Rescinded" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the Benefit Election is part of an event that has been corrected or rescinded.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Benefit_Plan_Summary_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the summary information about the benefit provider of the benefit plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Plan_Reference" type="wd:Benefit_PlanObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference for the benefit plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Group_Identifier" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The group identifier of the benefit plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Coverage_Type_Reference" type="wd:Benefit_Coverage_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The type of coverage that the benefit plan is for.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The default currency of the benefit plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Frequency_Reference" type="wd:FrequencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The default currency of the benefit plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Health_Care_Classification_Reference" type="wd:Health_Care_ClassificationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The classification of the health care plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Insurance_Coverage_Target_Reference" type="wd:Insurance_Coverage_TargetObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The insurance coverage target for the insurance plan.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Provider_Summary_Data" dependents covered for the election.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Dependent_Reference" name="Original_Coverage_Begin_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that coverage began for this election.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Coverage_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date that coverage ended for this election.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Original_Coverage_Begin_Date_for_Benefit_Coverage_Type" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Date_Covered_by_Benefit_Plan" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The very first date that the Dependent was covered by the Benefit Plan. Any gaps in coverage are ignored.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Date_Covered_by_Benefit_Provider" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The very first date that the Dependent was covered by the Benefit provider. Any gaps in coverage are ignored.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Provider_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Provider ID of the Primary Care Physician for the dependent.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="COBRA_Eligibility_Data" type="wd:COBRA_Eligibility_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains COBRA Eligibility detail for a participant. If this element is not populated then the participant is assumed to not be COBRA eligible.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="COBRA_Eligibility_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains COBRA Eligibility detail for a participant. If this element is not populated then the participant is assumed to not be COBRA eligible.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="COBRA_Eligibility_Reason_Reference" type="wd:COBRA_Eligibility_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason why the participant is eligible for COBRA. The reason is required if the participant is eligible for COBRA..</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Eligible_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The COBRA Eligible Date is the day the worker is eligible for COBRA coverage. It represents the worker's Last day of Coverage + 1 day. For example, if an employee terminated on June 28th and was covered to the end of the month (June 30th), you would enter the COBRA Eligible Date as July 1st.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Loss_of_Coverage_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Qualifying Event Date is the date of the event that caused the worker to be eligible for COBRA. For example, in the case of a dependent that is now over age, you would enter the birth date. If an employee has a reduction in hours and is now eligible for COBRA, you would enter the date they went from full-time to part-time.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Coverage_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date COBRA coverage ends for an employee or dependent. This is only required when the COBRA coverage ends on a different date than the COBRA provider would normally determine.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Benefit_Plan_Reference" type="wd:Benefit_PlanObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Benefit Plan whose coverage was number, or one address is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If you selected Use Employee Address, the employee for this dependent must have a If the Employee Contract ID is not specified, the employee contract will retain its existing Employee Contract ID. 2. If Employee Contract Reference is not specified, a new employee contract will be created with this Employee Contract ID. If the Employee Contract ID is not specified, the system will automatically generate a unique identifier.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Employee Contract ID is already in use.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Contract_Version_Date" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the contract version is created. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Job_Profile_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response element for Put Job Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Job_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique Identifier for a Job Profile. Also known as Job Profile ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Exceptions_Response_Data" type="wd:Application_Instance_Related_Exceptions_DataType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all Job Profile Data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Code" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique Identifier for a Job Profile. Also known as Job Profile ID.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You do not have a sequence generator setup. Specify a job code.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Effective_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>On a Put this is the date the change to the Job Profile will take effect. Will default to today if not submitted. On a Get this is the As of Effective Date specified in the Response Filter or today's date if no request criteria is specified. During implementation, we recommend using a date of 01-01-1900 for the initial entry.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The effective date of the change [date] cannot be earlier than the earliest effective date [early].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Basic_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Basic_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Classification_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Job_Classification_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Pay_Rate_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Pay_Rate_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Exempt_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Exempt_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Workers_Compensation_Code_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Workers_Compensation_Replacement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Worker's Compensation Code data for a Job Profile. This element does a complete replacement of data based on what is submitted. All Worker's Compensation Codes must be included for an update (unless none will be touched).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Qualification_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Qualification_Data_for_Position_Restriction_or_Job_ProfileType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Integration_Field_Override_Data" type="wd:Document_Field_Result_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Compensation_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Compensation_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Questionnaire_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Questionnaire_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the primary and secondary Questionnaires for internal and external career site for Job Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Job_Family_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing the Job Family data for a job profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Job_Family_Reference" type="wd:Job_FamilyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Job Family.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Delete" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If True is entered, the Job Family will be removed from this Job Profile as of the effective date.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Delete is selected but the Job Profile does not have the indicated Job Family. Job Profile: [profile] Job Family: [family]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Job_Classification_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Job Classification data for a Job Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Job_Classification_Reference" type="wd:Job_ClassificationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the job classification.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Delete" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If True is entered, the Job Classification will be removed from the Job Profile as of the effective date.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Delete is true but the job profile does not have this job classification as of the effective date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Pay_Rate_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Job Profile Pay Rate Data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one entry for a Country is allowed. This country is entered more than once: [country].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Country_Reference" type="wd:CountryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Country</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Pay_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Pay_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Pay Rate Type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Delete" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If True is entered, the Job Profile Pay Rate for the supplied country reference will be deleted.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Delete is selected but the Job Profile does not have a pay rate for the supplied country as of the effective date. Job Profile: [profile] Country: [country]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the Request References element to retrieve a specific instance(s) of Job Profile and its associated data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Job_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Job_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the job profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Skip_Non_Existing_Instances" type="xsd:boolean"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the Request Criteria element to limit the Job Profiles returned based on the specific criteria. Job Profiles that are returned must meet all of the criteria specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Criteria_Data" type="wd:Transaction_Log_CriteriaType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Event_Reference" type="wd:Unique_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The identifier of an existing Event.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Family_Reference" type="wd:Job_FamilyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of a Job Family or a Job Family Group. If a Job Family Group is submitted, any Job Profile that has a Job Family that is part of that Job Family Group will be returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Management_Level_Reference" type="wd:Management_LevelObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the management level.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Level_Reference" type="wd:Job_LevelObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for a job level.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Category_Reference" type="wd:Job_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the job category.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Insider_Type_Reference" type="wd:Company_Insider_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Company Insider Type ID. This is the unique identifier for a company insider type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Classification_Reference" type="wd:Job_ClassificationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the job classification.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Classification_Group_Reference" type="wd:Job_Classification_GroupObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for a job classification group.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Workers_Compensation_Code_Reference" type="wd:Workers_Compensation_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Workers' Compensation Code Reference ID. This is the unique identifier for a Workers' Compensation Code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Work_Hours_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Work_Hours_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier of a work hours profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Field_And_Parameter_Criteria_Data" type="wd:Field_And_Parameter_Criteria_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The response group allows for the response data to be tailored to only included elements that the user is looking for. If no response group is provided in the request, then all groups will be returned. If the Response Group element is returned, you can select which sections of data to include in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Reference element for the job profile is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Job_Profile_Basic_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the basic job profile information is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Job_Classification_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Job Classification Data is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Job_Profile_Pay_Rate_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Job Profile Pay Rate Type element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Job_Profile_Exempt_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Job Profile Job Exempt element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Workers_Compensation_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the workers' compensation code data is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Responsibility_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Responsibility Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Work_Experience_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Work Experience Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Education_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Education Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Language_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Language Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Competency_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Competency Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Certification_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Certification Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Training_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Training Qualifications element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Job_Profile_Compensation_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Compensation Rules using the Job Profile are included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Skill_Qualifications" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Skills associated with the Job Profile are included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Questionnaires" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates if the Questionnaires associated with the Job Profile are to be included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Job_Profiles_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Request element used to find and get Job Profiles and their associated data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Job_Profile_Request_ReferencesType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Job_Profile_Request_CriteriaType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Job_Profile_Response_GroupType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains each Job Profile based on the Request References or Request Criteria. The data returned is the current information as of the dates in the response filter, and does not include all historical information about the job profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile" type="wd:Job_Profile_Get_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Job_Profiles_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response element containing an instances of job profiles and their associated data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Job_Profile_Request_ReferencesType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Job_Profile_Request_CriteriaType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Job_Profile_Response_GroupType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Job_Profile_Response_DataType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Company_Insider_Job_Profile_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing the Company Insider Type data for a job profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Company_Insider_Type_Reference" type="wd:Company_Insider_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a company insider type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Delete" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If True is entered, the Company Insider Type will be removed from this Job Profile as of the effective date.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Delete is true but the job profile does not have this company insider type. Job Profile: [profile] Company Insider Type: [type]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Competency_Qualification_Profile_Replacement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Replacement element containing Competency Qualifications for the Job Profile When updating a Job Profile, all Competencies for the Job Profile will be replaced by the submitted data. If no data is submitted, then the existing Competencies are not changed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Competency_Reference" type="wd:SkillObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Competency.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Competency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Competency_Level_Reference" type="wd:Competency_LevelObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Competency Level Behavior.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Required" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean which identifies if the Competency is required for the Job Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Education_Qualification_Profile_Replacement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Replacement element containing Education Qualifications for the Job Profile When updating a Job Profile, all Education Qualifications for the Job Profile will be replaced by the submitted data. If no data is submitted, then the existing Education Qualifications are not changed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Degree that isn't already in use for this Field of Study.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Degree_Reference" type="wd:DegreeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique identifier of a Degree.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Field_Of_Study_Reference" type="wd:Field_of_StudyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique identifier of a Field of Study.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Required" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether Education Qualification Profile is required for Job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Training_Qualification_Profile_Replacement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Replacement element containing Training Qualifications for the Job Profile When updating a Job Profile, all Training Qualifications for the Job Profile will be replaced by the submitted data. If no data is submitted, then the existing Training Qualifications are not changed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Training Type is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Training Name is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Training_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying name of Training Program/Class.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying description of Training Program/Class.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Training_Type_Reference" type="wd:Training_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Training Type (Example: Instructor-led, Online)</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Required" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether Training Qualification Profile is required for Job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Responsibility_Qualification_Profile_Replacement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Replacement Element containing Responsibility Qualifications for the Job Profile. When updating a Job Profile, all Responsibilities for the Job Profile will be replaced by the data in being submitted. If no data is submitted, then the existing Responsibilities are not changed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Responsibility_Description" type="wd:RichText"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text attribute identifying a description of the Responsibility.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Required" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean attribute identifying whether the Responsibility is required.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Work_Experience_Qualification_Profile_Replacement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Replacement element containing Work Experience Qualifications for the Job Profile When updating a Job Profile, all Work Experiences for the Job Profile will be replaced by the submitted data. If no data is submitted, then the existing Work Experiences are not changed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Worker_Experience_Reference" type="wd:Work_Experience_SkillObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique identifier of a Work Experience.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Work_Experience_Rating_Reference" type="wd:Work_Experience_RatingObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unique identifier of a Work Experience Rating.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The rating is not valid for this work experience. You may submit a certification reference or name.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>You must either submit a Certification Reference or a Certification Name and Issuer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You must first select Enable Specialties for Certifications on the Maintain Skills and Experience Setup value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Compensation_Basis"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Amount representing the primary compensation basis for the worker in the currency and frequency value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Internal_Project_Experience_Data" type="wd:Internal_Project_Experience_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Internal Project name="Internal_Project_Experience_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the Internal Project Experience information.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for an internal project Only one in progress event is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Internal_Project_Experience_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Internal Project Experience ID.
