If a value is passed in an a corresponding internal project experience is not found, a new internal project experience will be created with the provided id.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Remove_Internal_Project_Experience" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Used for inbound operations to indicate that the internal project experience should be removed for the person. Will always return false for outbound operations.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove Internal Project Experience is true without an Internal Project Experience or valid Internal Project Experience ID. An Internal Project Experience or valid Internal Project Experience ID must be specified in order to remove the Internal Project Experience.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Internal_Project" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the project. Required unless the project is being removed.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Internal Project must be specified unless the Internal Project Experience is being removed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The project description.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the project started.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the project ended.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The End Date must be on or after the Start Date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Project_Leader" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The project leader. This field is free entry and is not tied in any way to any employee or other person in the system.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing reference to a specific Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Reference" type="wd:LocationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a specific Location to return.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Skip_Non_Existing_Instances" type="xsd:boolean"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing filtering criteria to specify the Location to return in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Location Name for the request criteria.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Usage_Reference" type="wd:Location_UsageObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the usage of the Location. (e.g. Business Site, Work Space, etc.)</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location_Type_Reference" type="wd:Location_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The location type associated with the location that ties to the usage that has been setup.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:choice><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exclude_Inactive_Locations" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Excludes inactive locations from being returned in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exclude_Active_Locations" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Excludes active locations from being returned in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Field_And_Parameter_Criteria_Data" type="wd:Field_And_Parameter_Criteria_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The response group allows for the response data to be tailored to only included elements that the user is looking for. If no response group is provided in the request, then all groups will be returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the Reference is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Location_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the Location Data element is included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains each Location based on the Request Reference or Request Criteria. The data returned is the current information as of the dates in the response filter, and does not include all historical information about the Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Location" type="wd:Location_ResponseType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Location_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response element containing an instance of Location and its associated data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Location_Reference" type="wd:LocationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Location_Data" type="wd:Location_iDataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Location_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains data for adding or updating a Location.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Location already exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Location_Reference" type="wd:LocationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Location. Only needed when updating the Reference ID for the Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Location_Data" type="wd:Location_iDataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all Location data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Location_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response element for Put Location operation.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Location_Reference" type="wd:LocationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the Location.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Exceptions_Response_Data" type="wd:Application_Instance_Related_Exceptions_DataType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Manage_Education_Data_for_RoleType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Education internal element 'Manage Education Data for Role'</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Source_Reference" type="wd:Person_Skill_Source_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the source of the skill.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Education" type="wd:EducationType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Manage_Professional_Affiliation_Data_for_RoleType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Professional Affiliation name="EducationType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Education information.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Education_Reference" type="wd:EducationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reference to the education profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Education_Data" type="wd:Education_Achievement_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Education_Achievement_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Education information.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The request must contain either a School Reference ID or School Name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for an education for a particular worker.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>There is an in progress event for this worker for the education: [education]. Only one in progress event is allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If you submit Date Degree Received, the Degree Completed Reference must have a value of Yes.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>In one or more cases, the degree selected for a worker is not available in the country where the degree was earned. Please make sure to only select degrees that are available in the country that the school is in.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If you submit School Name, Country field must have a value.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter the First Year Attended.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Last Year Attended that is after the First Year Attended.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter the Last Year Attended.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Education_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Education ID. If no value is provided, a new education will be created. If a value is passed in and a corresponding education is not found a new education will be created with the provided id.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Remove_Education" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Used for inbound operations to indicate that the education should be removed for the person. Will always return false for outbound operations.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove Education is true without an Education or valid Education ID. An Education or valid Education ID must be specified in order to remove the Education.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Country_Reference" type="wd:CountryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Reference of the Country in which the school is located. If the Country Reference and School Name matches an entry from the Schools report, this reference will not be set; a School Reference will be used instead.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="School_Reference" type="wd:SchoolObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Reference of the School where the education was received. The Schools report returns all of the schools that can be referenced.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="School_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the education institution.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="School_Type_Reference" type="wd:School_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A Reference of the of School Type. If a School Reference is submitted, or found by a matching Country Reference and School Name, this value will not be saved because the School Reference is linked to a School Type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Location" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The text location of the education institution. If a School Reference is submitted, or found by a matching Country Reference and School Name, this value will not be saved.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Degree_Reference" type="wd:DegreeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The degree earned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Degree_Completed_Reference" type="wd:Degree_CompletedObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the degree was received.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Date_Degree_Received" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date on which the degree was awarded.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Field_Of_Study_Reference" type="wd:Field_of_StudyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The field of study.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Grade_Average" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The grade point average.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Year_Attended" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The first year of attendance.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Year_Attended" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The last year of attendance.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Is_Highest_Level_of_Education" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates whether this is the worker's highest level of education. Degrees are ranked using Qualification Rating Value. If a worker has two or more equivalent degrees, the most recent one is considered highest.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Day_Attended" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The first date of attendance using day month year precision. Note this can only be populated when the Education is for a Worker in a Country that has been configured to 'Use Date with Day Precision for Education' on Tenant Setup - Global.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Day_Attended" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The last date of attendance using day month year precision. Note this can only be populated when the Education is for a Worker in a Country that has been configured to 'Use Date with Day Precision for Education' on Tenant Setup - Global.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Job_Profile_Get_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response element components of a name in local script, such as the First Name and Last Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains first name in local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Middle_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains middle name in local script for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains last name in local script, which is generally configured to as Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Last_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains secondary last name in local script, which is generally configured to as Maternal Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains first name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Middle_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains middle name in second local script for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains last name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Last_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains secondary last name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Maternal Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Local_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the formatted local name in local script as configured for the country.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute name="Local_Script" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the formatted local script name which contains the ISO code and name.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Feedback_Received_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the employee's feedback received</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Feedback_Received" type="wd:Feedback_ReceivedType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the informational components of a feedback (comment, date, question asked, sender, requester, and type).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Feedback_ReceivedType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the informational components of a feedback (comment, date, question asked, sender, requester, and type).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The worker who sent the feedback or displayed as anonymous</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Requested_By_Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The worker who requested the feedback</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Feedback_Type" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The feedback type</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date when feedback was submitted</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Feedback_Response_Data" type="wd:Feedback_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element for Feedback Comments and Questions. There can be multiple questions per request, thus multiple comments per feedback given.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Local_Name_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the components of a name in local script, such as the First Name and Last Name, for supporting name="Job_Family_Group_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing all Job Family Group data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Effective date of Job Family Group</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The effective date of the change [date] here.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Difficulty_to_Fill_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>References name="Academic_Rank_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Container for all the detail information about the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Rank" type="wd:Academic_RankType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Academic Rank Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Academic_Ranks_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response Element for Get Academic Unit</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Academic_Rank_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Request References</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Academic_Rank_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Request Criteria</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response Filter</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response results for Get Academic Rank Web Service</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Academic_Rank_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Container for all the detail information about the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Academic_Rank_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Container for all the detail information about the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A Reference ID for the Academic Rank generated by Workday and used for internal purposes only</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Academic_Rank_Title_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Name of the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>An Academic Rank already exists with this name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The description of the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Emeritus" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Academic Rank Emeritus Status</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Rank_Order"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Academic Rank Order</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="3"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Job_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Job_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Job Profiles to be associated with the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Validation Error: Occurs when Job Profile that is selected is inactive</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Job Profile selected is inactive. Please choose another Job Profile.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Metadata_Academic_Rank_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Rank_MappingObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Metadata Academic Rank Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Inactive" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not the Academic Rank is considered Inactive. If set, the static text (inactive) will be appended to the Academic Rank's default display ID (Academic Rank Name).</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Academic_Rank_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Request element for the Put Academic Rank Request</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Add Only is true but Academic Rank Title ID is already in use.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Rank_Reference" type="wd:Academic_RankObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Academic_Rank_Data" type="wd:Academic_Rank_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Container for all the detail information about the Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Academic_Rank_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Response element for the Put Academic Rank Response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Rank_Reference" type="wd:Academic_RankObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to Academic Rank</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Worker_Career_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the current career information for an employee. This includes the travel and relocation preferences, job profiles the employee is interested in, and their career interests</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Relocation_Data" type="wd:Relocation_Preference_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Travel_Data" type="wd:Travel_Preference_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Job_Interests_Data" type="wd:Job_Interests_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Career_Interests_Data" type="wd:Career_Preferences_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Academic_Appointment_Snapshot_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing the specifics for the academic appointment being added or updated. An academic appointment tracks an academic worker’s time at a university or college.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Update Date must be prior to the Academic Appointment End Date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The key Reference ID for the Academic Appointment Track/Thread is required for an Update Academic Appointment request.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Appointment Tracks with an In-Progress event cannot be updated or ended until the In-Progress event is completed or cancelled</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Appointment_Track_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Appointment_TrackObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reference to the Academic Appointment Thread being updated. Leave blank in an Add Academic Appointment task. Required for an Update. The appointment reference is assigned during the Add Academic Appointment business process that created the appointment thread.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Appointment is not valid for the specified Worker or Academic Affiliate.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Appointment_Track_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The unique identifier for the Academic Appointment Track. This is used when you want to manually assign or update the Appointment Track ID.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Appointment Track ID you specified is already in use.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Track_Type_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Track_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Academic Track Type for the appointment.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Academic Track Type is required for Add Academic Appointment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Updates to Academic Track Type are not allowed for Update Academic Appointment</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Inactive Academic Track Types are not allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>This Academic Track Type is not allowed by the Academic Unit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Track Type Category for this Track Type is set to Inactive.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Appointment_Identifier_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Appointment_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference for the Appointment Identifier that indicates the type of appointment; for example, could be primary, joint, or dual. Only one of an academic’s active appointments may be assigned an Identifier with a Identifier Description marked as Primary. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Position_Reference" type="wd:Position_ElementObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A Position, filled by the Worker, for the Academic Appointment. Note: This field only accepts Positions that are already filled. You cannot use a the same Position from a Hire or Add if this is a sub-process.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[position] is not currently a valid Position for worker [worker].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Academic_Unit_Reference" type="wd:Academic_UnitObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference for the Academic Unit for the Appointment assignment. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select an Academic Unit that is available as of [Start Date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select an Academic Unit that is available as of [Start Date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Roster_Percent"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Percent ownership of the academic by the appointment’s Academic Unit (0.00 - 1.0). May be blank or zero; for example, for centers and institutes. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Roster Percent cannot be greater than 100 percent (1.0).</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Appointment_Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the Add Appointment or Update Appointment business process entries take effect. Will not default from the existing value on an update. Will default from the parent business process when this is a sub process.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Appointment_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Informational date that tracks the term of the Appointment. Will be blank when an academic is holding a tenured appointment. Will not default from the existing value on an update.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Appointment End Date must be greater than the Appointment Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Track_Start_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override for Academic Appointment Track Start Date</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The value supplied for the Track Start Date must be less than or equal to the Appointment Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Rank_Reference" type="wd:Academic_RankObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference for the Academic Rank associated with the Appointment. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Rank must be an allowed value for the Academic Track Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Named_Professorship_Reference" type="wd:Named_ProfessorshipObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Named Professorship associated with the Appointment</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it is in a Pending status.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it has been associated with the current Appointment track in the past.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it associated with In-Progress Edit Named Professorship event.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it associated with an In-Progress Academic Appointment event.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it is in a Discontinued status.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it is in a On Hold status.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as it is Filled.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>[professorship] is not a valid Named Professorship for the Appointment as the Initial Established Date is greater than Appointment Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Appointment_Specialty_Reference" type="wd:Appointment_SpecialtyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Appointment Specialty for Appointment Reference</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an active Appointment Specialty.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an Appointment Specialty that is associated with 1 of these: the appointment's Academic Unit, Academic Unit Hierarchy or its superiors.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Constructed_Title" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Do not enter, Constructed Title will be defaulted and used if all fields pertaining to rule set for track is supplied.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Do not enter, Constructed Title will be defaulted and used if all fields pertaining to rule set for track is supplied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Appointment_Title" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Title assigned to the academic while holding the Appointment. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Adjusted_Title_Start_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Manually adjusted date for when the title and/or rank were earned. Used when academic has earned credit for time spent at another institution. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Review_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Manually maintained date that acts as a reminder to review the academic for promotion. Only applies when the Appointment’s Track includes a Promotion program. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Academic Review Date must be greater than the Appointment Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Related_Academic_Unit_Reference" type="wd:Academic_UnitObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Related Academic Unit for Appointment Reference</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Related Academic Unit that is available as of [Start Date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Related Academic Unit that is available as of [Start Date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tenure_Home_Reference" type="wd:Academic_UnitObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The academic unit that serves as the appointment's tenure home.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tenure Home is required If the track type includes a tenure program. Otherwise, Tenure Home is not allowed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Tenure Home that is available as of [Start Date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Tenure Home that is available as of [Start Date].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tenure_Status_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Tenure_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference for Academic Tenure Status. Only applies when the Appointment’s Track includes a Tenure program. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tenure Status is not allowed if the Academic Track does not include a tenure program.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tenure Status Reference is required if the Academic Track includes tenure program.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Probationary_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the Academic Tenure probationary period is expected to end. Only applies when the Appointment’s Track includes a Tenure program. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Probationary End Date is not allowed if the Academic Track Type does not include a tenure program.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Probationary End Date must be greater than the Appointment Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Probationary end date is not allowed if the academic tenured status has a value of true for "tenured."</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tenure_Award_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date the academic was awarded full Tenure status. Only applies when the Appointment’s Track includes a Tenure program. On an update, the existing value will be retained if not sent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tenure Award Date is not allowed if the Academic Track does not include a tenure program.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tenure Award Date is required if Academic Tenure Status is set to Tenured.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tenure Award Date is not allowed if the Academic Tenure Status is not Tenured.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Travel_Preference_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the information about the employees willingness to travel as part of their job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Willing_to_Travel_Reference" type="wd:Mobility_ChoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to whether an employee is willing to travel as part of their job. The only values allowed are: Yes, No, and Maybe.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Travel_Amount_Reference" type="wd:Travel_AmountObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to the amount of time that the employee is willing to travel for as part of their job. This is only applicable when the employee is willing to travel (Willing to Travel = Yes or Maybe).</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Travel Amount Reference is inactive.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Willing to Travel should be set to 'Yes' or 'Maybe' in-order to specify any Travel Amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Travel_Additional_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>More information about why (or why not) the employee is willing to travel as part of their job.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="End_Academic_Appointment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the End Academic Appointment business process.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Track End Date that is after [date_formatted], the most recent add or update date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Appointment Tracks with an In-Progress event cannot be updated or ended until the In-Progress event is completed or cancelled</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Appointment is not valid for the specified Worker.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Worker submitted has no Academic Appointments available to end.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Worker submitted has more than one Academic Appointment, so an Academic Appointment Track reference must be supplied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Appointment is not valid for the specified Academic Affiliate.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academic Affiliate submitted has more than one Academic Appointment, so an Academic Appointment Track reference must be supplied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Academc Affiliate submitted has no Academic Appointments available to end.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You cannot end an Academic Appointment that is already ended.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Worker whose appointment is being ended.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Employee_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Worker reference or Academic Affiliate reference is required unless the end academic appointment business process is a sub-process.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>An Academic Affiliate is not allowed when processing an appointment as a sub-process.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:Academic_AffiliateObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Academic Affiliate whose appointment is being ended.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Academic_Affiliate_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Appointment_Track_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Appointment_TrackObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Academic Appointment Track that is being ended.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Reason_Reference" type="wd:General_Event_SubcategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Reason for the End Academic Appointment business process.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Event_Classification_Subcategory_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Track_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date that the Academic Appointment Track is being ended.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="End_Academic_Appointment_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Top-level request element to end an academic appointment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Business_Process_Parameters" type="wd:Business_Process_ParametersType"/><xsd:element name="End_Academic_Appointment_Data" type="wd:End_Academic_Appointment_DataType"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Academic_Appointment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Top-level response element for Academic Appointment business process operations.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Event_Reference" type="wd:Unique_IdentifierObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Academic Appointment business process.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Worker that the business process applies to.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:Academic_AffiliateObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Academic Affiliate that the business process applies to.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Academic_Appointment_Track_Reference" type="wd:Academic_Appointment_TrackObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Academic Appointment Track that the business process applies to.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Provisioning_Group_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the Request References element to retrieve a specific instance(s) of provisioning groups.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Provisioning_Group_Request_Reference" type="wd:Provisioning_GroupObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A unique identifier to reference a provisioning group.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Provisioning_Group_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The response group allows for the response data to be tailored to only included elements that the user is looking for. Inactive Academic Units, however, can continue to contain historical Appointments and can be viewed and reported on. Prompts will include the Inactive Academic Units in a separate folder.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Company_Reference" Status Date cannot be before the Date of Birth</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Disability Status Date cannot be before the Date of Birth</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The element Disability Reference is required if a Disability Status Date is entered.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The element Disability Reference is required if a Disability Status Date is entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Disability_Date_Known" Date Known cannot be before the Date of Birth.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Disability_End_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date through which the worker is considered disabled. In some countries, this is the date through which the certification for the current level of disability is effective.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Disability End Date cannot be before the Date of Birth.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Disability_Grade_Reference" value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Disability_Remaining_Capacity"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The percentage of that the Free-form text entry.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Time_Type" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Time Type for the former worker. Updating via the web service is no longer allowed.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>This former worker has been rehired or contracted. Reference ID Type: Former_Worker_ID</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Former_Worker_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Utilize the Request Criteria element to limit the Former Workers returned based on the specific criteria. date.{+3}</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Updated To Date must be less than or equal to Current Moment</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Updated_From_Moment" name="Terminated_To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Defines the latest termination date to return.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="National_ID_Criteria_Data" type="wd:Worker_by_National_ID_Request_CriteriaType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Former_Workers_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Request element used to retrieve Former Workers and their name="Former_WorkerType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the data for adding or updating a Former Worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" corrected.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Main_Transaction_Log_Entry_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The details type="wd:Transaction_LogObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to a transaction log entry.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Data" type="wd:Transaction_Log_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing the rescind and correction data of the transaction log entry.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Transaction_Log_Rescind_And_Correct_Event_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Details on the rescind or correct of the event described in the main transaction data section.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Reference" type="wd:Transaction_LogObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to a transaction log entry.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Log_Description" name="Is_Correction" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True if this is a correction of the main transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Is_Rescind" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>True if this is a rescind of the main transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Prior_Effective_Moment" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date attribute identifying the effective moment of the transaction prior to the correction. minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Entry_Moment" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Date attribute identifying the entry moment of the name="Corrected_Or_Rescinded_Transaction_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Transaction Data for an event that has been rescinded or corrected.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Main_Transaction_Data" type="wd:Main_Transaction_Log_Entry_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Correction_Or_Rescind_Data" type="wd:Transaction_Log_Rescind_And_Correct_Event_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Former_Worker_Personal_Information_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Personal data for the former worker.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Name_Data" type="wd:Person_Name_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Birth_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A person's birth date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ethnicity_Reference" type="wd:EthnicityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Indicates the ethnicities that a person has.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" Latino.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Contact_Information_Data" type="wd:Contact_Information_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="National_Identifier_Data" type="wd:National_IDType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Change_Additional_Name_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for Additional Name Change web service.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Worker that the additional name data will be applied contact.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Primary Emergency Contact cannot be deleted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Primary Emergency Contact reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The emergency contact reference does not belong to the Person reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Primary emergency contact must have numeric priority of 1.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Primary emergency contact must have numeric priority of 1.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Alternate emergency contacts must have priority greater than 1</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Alternate emergency contacts must have priority greater than 1</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Emergency Contact Reference is required when deleting a emergency contact entry.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Emergency Contact Reference is required when deleting a emergency contact entry.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please mark another emergency contact as Primary. One and only one emergency contact must be specified as Primary.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please mark another emergency contact as Primary. One and only one emergency contact must be specified as Primary.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Emergency_Contact_Reference" type="wd:Emergency_ContactObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the emergency contact that the data will be applied to</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Delete" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating that the referenced data should be deleted.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Emergency_Contact_Data" type="wd:Change_Emergency_Contact_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Change_Emergency_Contact_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element for the emergency contact</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Emergency Contact ID field is for updating the value of the Emergency Contact's integration ID.
